name: Change Permissions - Admin Roles - System Admin
objective: Change Permissions - Admin Roles - System Admin

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
1. Login as Sysadmin and visit System Console > System Roles page.
2. Click on System Admin Role and check if user is not allowed to change any of the permissions in any of the sections.
inline.expectedResult: Sysadmin should not be allowed to change any permissions for any of the sections for Sysadmin role. All permission dropdowns should not be editable and should have Read+Write permissions selected.
